v-model.description: Whether the manual status is visible

content.type: string/array（当模式为菜单模式时，content 属性格式为 Array）
content.description: The content that is displayed, which can also be passed in via slot#content
content.description_zh: 显示的内容，也可以通过 slot#content 传入

mode.type: normal（普通模式）/ menu（菜单模式）
mode.description: The mode of the current display determines how the content is presented
mode.description_zh: 当前显示的模式，决定内容的展现形式

placement.type: top / top-start / top-end / bottom / bottom-start / bottom-end / left / left-start / left-end / right / right-start / right-end

visible-arrow.description: Whether to display a popover arrow
visible-arrow.description_zh: 是否显示 popover 箭头

offset.description: The offset of the occurrence position

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the explicit and implicit value of POP changes
events.description_zh: pop 显隐值变化时触发

events.name: menuclick
events.description: In menu mode, click on an option to trigger
events.description_zh: menu 模式下点击某一选项触发

slots.name: content
slots.description_zh: 多行内容或用户自定义样式
